languages.text: Позволил{mf||а} продолжать дворянам пришивать лица на Тассере.
Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.
languages.original_text: Позволил{mf||а} продолжать дворянам пришивать лица на Тассере.

traits.locale_text: Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing others' faces on themselves.
Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing others' faces on themselves.
Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

languages.text: タッセーラの貴族たちが他人の顔の皮を自分の顔に縫いつけるという風習を維持することを許可した。
languages.original_text: Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: タッセーラの貴族たちが他人の顔の皮を自分の顔に縫いつけるという風習を維持することを許可した。

languages.text: Du hast dem thasserianischen Adel gestattet, seine Tradition beizubehalten, sich die Gesichter anderer Leute auf das eigene zu nähen.
languages.original_text: Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Du hast dem thasserianischen Adel gestattet, seine Tradition beizubehalten, sich die Gesichter anderer Leute auf das eigene zu nähen.

languages.text: Vous avez permis aux nobles thasseriens de conserver leur coutume consistant à coudre le visage de quelqu'un d'autre sur le leur.
languages.original_text: Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez permis aux nobles thasseriens de conserver leur coutume consistant à coudre le visage de quelqu'un d'autre sur le leur.

languages.text: Permitiste a la nobleza thasseriana que continuase la práctica de coserse rostros de otras personas a los suyos.
languages.original_text: Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Permitiste a la nobleza thasseriana que continuase la práctica de coserse rostros de otras personas a los suyos.

languages.text: 你允许塔瑟拉的贵族继续保留将别人的脸缝到自己脸上的习俗。
languages.original_text: Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: 你允许塔瑟拉的贵族继续保留将别人的脸缝到自己脸上的习俗。

languages.text: Thassera soylularının, başkalarının yüzlerine kendi yüzlerine dikme geleneğini sürdürmelerine izin verdin.
languages.original_text: Permitted the Thasserian nobility to maintain their custom of sewing other people's faces onto their own.

traits.locale_text: Thassera soylularının, başkalarının yüzlerine kendi yüzlerine dikme geleneğini sürdürmelerine izin verdin.
